lg.l: There was a call
I remember it well and when
The memory of your laughter
Like an echo on the other end
I thought I heard your voice sing
But I know that it can’t be real
Even though you’re not here
Somehow you’re always
Close to me
I still see you
Here in this room
And all the things we talked about
I say them all again and try
To make sense of hope and love
When I am whispering you name
I close my eyes I see you again
I wish that I could tell you
The love that I hold on to
Is my strength through my sorrow
That leads me tomorrow
